'''Nicholas 'Nick'Â Boulton''' (born 1968) is a British actor. He is best known for his voice acting roles in videogames, such as ''Dragon Age II'' and ''Mass Effect 3''.

In [[Season 5]] he will portray the [[Fighting pit announcer|fighting pit announcer]].<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/new-cast-members-confirmed-and-exciting-new-views-in-osuna/]</ref>
